reviews.review:
Es muy divertido con amigos, un buen juego para pasar el rato cuando no sabes que hacer, no se me hace aburrido jugarlo varias veces. Lo recomiendo! 
Aunque deber√≠an bajar un poco los precios de los DLC
Enjoy this game a lot. The asymetrical PvP in this game is a lot of fun
Good Game. Sehr unterhaltsam, vor allem mit Freunden. Jedoch sollte mehr Arbeit in Bug Fixes investiert werden.
No communication in game. A team based multiplayer game, with no way to communicate inside a game... in 2019...
Extremely good, even with some OP killers, the game is well balanced (sometimes) and is pretty funny.
Fun competitive game, queue times are still quite chilling for killers more than survivors, but once you're in is quite a lot of fun!
It's a solid game, and plays best with a good group of friends.
Fun game, devs constantly adding new dlc.

DBD is adult hide and seek consisting of killers and survivors. I got the game when it first launched, and its been quite a journey watching the development of the game. Many killers have been added including several horror icons: Freddy, Myers, Ghost face, etc. Its fun to play solo or with friends.
Lots of fun but still kinda buggy and dev team seam to always find a way to mess it up.
Really fun Game,Would recommend to everyone and friends

one of the worst games i have EVER played 
10/10
I think they did pretty good job so far.

This game is kinda aids not going to lie. Anyone looking to get this game, start with survivor. Other people in the reviews probably say survivor is really weak and bad and killer is op. This is really wrong. When you start out with the game it will seem like that but its not. At high ranks survivors can run you around for about 2-3 minutes if they know what they are doing.  Generators take 80 seconds to complete only 20 seconds if 4 people are working on it. Soooooo gens go really fast. Despite this, its a really fun/addicting game that if you take seriously, it will probably kill you from stress. #NerfGenerators.

Spooky game. Learning curve can be a bit much for newcomers, but stick with it and you'll get addicted. Only gripe with the game is the community can be a little bit on the toxic side.

This is a great game with a lot of horror movie characters.
Great game really fun with friends or even alone
If you like horror movies and competitive gameplay this is the game for you. Whether you root for the survivors or secretly want to see the villains win, it doesn't matter.

Amazingly done, really fun to play. Always has my heart pounding from the adrenaline! Great game!

the idea of the game is amazing addictive but what makes it aggressive is the glitches and the bugs... as the dev said 'We did a pretty good job so far' yeah good not great and as long there's bug fixes and stability improvements, this game won't die further more i don't give a shiet about costumes yet till they are tradeable/marketable :)
